body.name: LG 75-Inch Class UQ7590 Series 4K Smart TV, AI-Powered 4K, Cloud Gaming (75UQ7590PUB, 2022),Grey
deliveryMessages: FREE scheduled delivery as soon as Friday, February 16, 8 AM - 11 AM
features: a5 GEN5 AI PROCESSOR: Enhance your picture and sound with AI from the a5 Gen5 AI Processor.
WEBOS 22: Customize your viewing experience with separate accounts and personalized recommendations for every member of your family.

ULTIMATE STREAMING: Find your faves fast with built-in access to Netflix, Prime Video, Apple TV app, Disney+, HBO Max and instant access to over 300+ free LG Channels with everything from comedy to movies to sports.
LG CHANNELS: Discover something new or find your faves with free access to programming on over 300+ LG Channels.
GAME OPTIMIZER: Make it the best gaming experience by quickly adjusting all your game settings in one location.
body.description: Dive into a world of free content, thanks to over 300+ free LG Channels* and personalized recommendations for everyone you share the remote with.*Number of LG Channels subject to change.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Smart TV, simplified Do less searching and more streaming, thanks to the next generation of ThinQ AI and webOS. Stream your favorite shows, including fitness, sports, entertainment and more. Plus, get instant access to over 300 free channels with LG Channels.

Immerse yourself with a 4K UHD processor Experience enhanced picture detail and improved sound from the α5 AI Processor Gen6 that detects room lighting to adjust color and picture contrast to optimal settings. See every detail with impressive 4K upscaling Transform your regular content into 4K for sharper definition and detail, even on our biggest screens.
Make every night movie night Get your popcorn ready with a 4K viewing experience that’ll make it feel like you’re at the theater.
Up your game Make it the best gaming experience with Game Dashboard by quickly adjusting all your game settings in one location.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars VERY good picture
reviews.reviewText: I did not really think TV picture could get "better". This one as soon as I hooked it up at first the picture seemed "off", like fake. Don't know how to describe it. After a few I realized what was going on was it seemed more like I was watching things going on through a window they looked so "real". That's why at first it seemed "off". I was going to let Wife pic out a sound bar next. We will get a Surround Sound at some time but the built in has options to make it also sound amazing. Shockingly nice for so little money all the way around.Remote is kind of "odd", but I had already ordered a better one made for this TV. Just put batteries in it and it is already programed to the TV.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been playing with the setting for two days. I like the video quality and colors, audio quality, its functions, and the size. It had a video delay in streaming videos, but I found a function in settings to match the video and audio.I reckon the quality of the product is in accordance with the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good quality TV for bedroom
reviews.reviewText: TV is great quality and user friendly, image great very clear, sound is really good however a I added a small sound bar to it, the size was perfect for my bedroom it easy to mount on the wall as TV is not that heavy, the only thing I don’t like from it, it’s the remote control that comes with it, it is very simple and cheaply made, the tv WebOS is modern but in order to get the best of it, it is advisable to get the LG magic remote to get the best of it, with the magic remote you are able to control all the devices with just that remote, including external sound bar and cable box, regardless of the way it is connected to the TV, wheeler be thru HDMI or digital out, overall this a decent, good and affordable Tav to upgrade your bedroom, or kids TV, you won’t be disappointed.CJ,

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We were looking for a good TV to go in the wife's office in the house. This one is year back in release dates, but checked all the boxes we wanted. Picture is superb and it is a smart TV (smarter than me). We dropped the satellite system and went with Youtube TV over fiber. It quickly found the WiFi and asked for the password.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars not the fastest but really good image quality
reviews.reviewText: It doesn't have the fastest processor but it has unbeatable image quality in this price range. I suggest playing around with settings, default ones might not be the best for most people. I have anything and everything I want to have on a smart TV.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Check your TV once it arrives because the seller is no help!!
reviews.reviewText: Took me just over 30 days to open the box to hang the TV on the wall. It was the holidays and work was crazy. When I do hang it there is a crack in the screen. Amazon refused to take it back or replace it to contact the seller. I contact LG they say I have to talk to Amazon. They won’t even provide warranty support. Beware LG!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks good so far , no issues , love the price !
reviews.reviewText: Love the price , easy to set up , great picture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Slow Web OS
reviews.reviewText: Picture is good, price is good, but as an owner of a higher model LG, I am very disappointed in the speed of the TV OS. Button presses are delayed and it seems like the TV is always catching up to my navigation. Once I'm watching something it's not an issue but often aggravating to wait on the delays.
